title: Smart Data Models - GovGASTWD
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Woodward Gas turbine governor model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovGASTWD

af1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Exhaust temperature Parameter (Af1). Default: 0.0

af2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient equal to 0.5(1-speed) (Af2). Default: 0.0

bf1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. (Bf1).  Bf1 = E(1-w) where E (speed sensitivity coefficient) is 0.55 to 0.65 x Tr. Default: 0.0

bf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine Torque Coefficient K (depends on heating value of fuel stream in combustion chamber) (Bf2). Default: 0.0

cf2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Coefficient defining fuel flow where power output is 0% (Cf2).  Synchronous but no output.  Typically 0.23 x K(23% fuel flow). Default: 0.0

ecr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Combustion reaction time delay (Ecr). Default: 0

etd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine and exhaust delay (Etd). Default: 0

k3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Ratio of Fuel Adjustment (K3). Default: 0.0

k4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain of radiation shield (K4). Default: 0.0

k5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain of radiation shield (K5). Default: 0.0

k6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum fuel flow (K6). Default: 0.0

kd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Drop Governor Gain (Kd). Default: 0.0

kf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel system feedback (Kf). Default: 0.0

ki.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Isochronous Governor Gain (Ki). Default: 0.0

kp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. PID Proportional gain (Kp). Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

t.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel Control Time Constant (T). Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Radiation shield time constant (T3). Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermocouple time constant (T4). Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature control time constant (T5). Default: 0

tcd.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Compressor discharge time constant (Tcd). Default: 0

td.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power transducer time constant (Td). Default: 0

tf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fuel system time constant (Tf). Default: 0

tmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum Turbine limit (Tmax). Default: 0.0

tmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum Turbine limit (Tmin). Default: 0.0

trate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine rating (Trate).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

tt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temperature controller integration rate (Tt). Default: 0
